commitResults.messageTitle: add String dividor modified greeting
Renamed String dividor to div_open add String div_close
Separated greetings message from logo
Added echo and exit
Added String array list
Modified dividor names
Add list command
Added add, fixed bugs for wrong list numbering
Added class Task
Added toString method
Changed if-else to switch cases
Fixed Duke to utilize class Task
Completed mark and unmark commands
Added classes Todo, Deadline and Event
Added commands todo, deadline, event Added print for number of tasks
Fixed minor formatting issue to exclude blank character
Automated Text UI testing
Added DukeException class
Attempt to separate commands with methods
Added parser method
Set up necessary methods to be called after parser
Draft for todo, deadline, event methods
Fixed bugs where taskName is not displayed fully
Added more exception descriptions
Changed list to ArrayList
Modified program to utilize ArrayList, added unknown command exception
Added delete command and its test cases
Modified Task class to use enums as task status, added new status "DOING"
Adjust case indentation to follow java convention
Add basic file support to open /data/data.txt
commitResults.messageBody:
Need a system to save and load tasks for Duke.

Java NIO Paths class is used to load up directory for Duke's data
and load data.txt file to load any existing tasks from previous
execution of the program.

Structure for data.txt on how it will be saved is implemented later.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add saveFile method that saves current list of tasks to data.txt
commitResults.messageBody:
Need a way to save current list of tasks to be loaded in future.

Update Task class and all of its subclasses to tokenise the current
tasks in the list. Write this to data.txt and save it.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add switch case in loadFile method to parse data read
Add new constructor for Task class
commitResults.messageBody:
data.txt is able to contain information about task's status. This
constructor allows the information to be loaded in as well when
Duke runs and load data in from data.txt

commitResults.messageTitle: Complete save and load function
commitResults.messageBody:
Update constructors for all subclasses of Task class to allow
task status to be loaded from previous data. Duke program is also
updated to allow data saving every update of tasks.

Need to work out a way to make duke only update added/deleted
tasks as it overwrites the whole data.txt, costing running time.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add experimental LocalDate when parsing for Deadline class
Add LocalDate variable to Deadline
commitResults.messageBody:
Implementing LocalDate within Deadline class is simpler and more
OOP, hence it was moved off the parser within Duke class over to
the Deadline class.

commitResults.messageTitle: Implement LocalDate class to store dates within Task classes
commitResults.messageBody:
Expanded on top of previous commit and implemented LocalDate within
Event class too. Added extra format method in toString method to
display dates in different format.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add new classes for more OOP implementation
Implement Storage class to open and load data file
Implement TaskList class to manage tasks
Make the code more OOP
commitResults.messageBody: Methods are extracted into respective classes to support more OOP.

commitResults.messageTitle: Fix bugs where wrong date input format would crash the program
commitResults.messageBody:
Not all constructors for tasks were updated and loading would result
in tasks not having proper LocalDate attribute.

Applied relevant changes to load tasks correctly with proper dates.

commitResults.messageTitle: Pack all classes under duke package
Add JUnit tests for Todo and Storage
Update build.gradle for shadowjar
Change build.gradle's mainClassName
Add JavaDoc comments for all public methods
Tweak the code to comply with a coding standard
Add find method that prints all tasks with matching keyword
Tweak code to comply with coding standard checked by CheckStyle
Add JavaFX basics for GUI implementation
Add GUI to Duke
commitResults.messageBody: Greeting message and closing message still needs to be implemented.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add greeting message and handled exiting program
commitResults.messageBody:
Greeting message was added in the initialize method of MainWindow.
Exiting program was handled by multithreading a ExitThread and
calling System.exit(0).
